reviews.title: Update has broken it
reviews.comment: Updated and now I cant connect to any stations. on galaxy note 2 stock please fix and I will rate 5 stars.
reviews.author: Pauline White

reviews.title: Looks good but connectivity lacking
reviews.comment: The app look great and on the face of it there are a lot of radio stations. However, of the three stations that I regularly listen to only 1 connects even though the other are in the list. I\'ve sent error emails from the app a number of times but had no response.   Very disappointing as once upon a time it worked a lot better than it does now.
reviews.author: Steve Dobson

reviews.title: Works, but massive storage space
reviews.comment: 75MB for a radio app! 2nd biggest app on my device. Why? The app itself works well and streams all available UK stations. Nice graphics, but tuning animation/sound effect gets irritating and partly explains large storage requirement.
reviews.author: Neill Mitchell

reviews.comment: Magnificent retro effect . It works perfect on my galaxy note 8.I am loving it.
reviews.author: Andy Yalle

reviews.title: Scam
reviews.comment: App is not working on my HTC one(m7)4.2.2 I did try all radio station non of them working?totally scam.please refund my money
reviews.author: alireza Saidi

reviews.title: Subpar app
reviews.comment: The Iphone app is a better app  I cannot listen to my mp3\'s in the timer setting, only the radio stations. I would love to go to sleep while listening to my mp3\'s, please add this feature
reviews.author: Doug Braden

reviews.title: Great Radio and Alarm
reviews.comment: Works great for me, just wish it worked on my Tablet.
reviews.author: Steve Moses

reviews.title: Help!!!
reviews.comment: I have been using the premium app for about 6 months now. I canged phones about  a month ago. After I Repurchased the app, my stations no longer work on mobile data. I verified that the WiFi only was turned off.  When connected to WiFi everything works as expected.  All was fine until update.
reviews.author: DerrickWms DerrickW

reviews.title: Brightness
reviews.comment: Doesnt follow the device brightness setting. Do not open in darkness, youll be blinded :p
reviews.author: Pan Waltz

reviews.title: Free app just as good
reviews.comment: I used the free app, but upgraded. Settings/stations weren\'t copied so pita to setup again.  As others have mentioned, why so big download..  Other than removing in app ads free up just as good..
reviews.author: Artur Rzasa

reviews.title: Station selection sucks
reviews.comment: It was only after the 15 minute refund period that I found that there are non e of my favorite radio stations on this. What a waste of money!
reviews.author: John Ullom

reviews.title: 50MiB?
reviews.comment: This application occupies more than 50MiB of my phone\'s internal memory and can\'t be moved to the SD card. It is just a simple radio app with 3-4 fancy screens. I hate to have to insult someone over their work and I rarely do but these developers should take some real app development courses.
reviews.author: Marios Andreopoulos

reviews.title: Nice.
reviews.comment: Everything works very well and it looks good.
reviews.author: Hachig Rudolph Alyanakian

reviews.title: Good, but for a new niggles.
reviews.comment: Looks great, works great. But a few changes would be nice.  First, when you set the alarm, there is no notification in the status bar to let you know it\'s set (unlike the default android clock, or just about every other alarm program). A simple little ongoing notification that the program has, in fact, got the alarm ready would be a great reassurance.  Second, no matter what I try, the snooze is stuck on 10 minutes. Doesn\'t seem to matter what I set it for in the alarm setup screen, it\'s always a 10 minute snooze.  Third, you can set the alarm to a \"radio station\" to wake up to streaming audio. But, it would be nice if the alarm had a \"fail-safe\" notification sound option in case you are in an area of bad service, or turn off data during the night to save battery.
reviews.author: Mark Peterson

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Beautiful graphics. Works on my boyfriend\'s iphone.... But wont play a single station on my htc evo
reviews.author: Galleria vivace

reviews.title: Ruined!
reviews.comment: Since this last update, no longer opens or works. Please fix and please can this be moved to the SD card?
reviews.author: Stephen Lincoln
